title: Top Places to visit in Kalahandi, Bhawanipatna, Odisha
content: Kalahandi is a district of Odisha in India. The region had a glorious past and great civilisation in ancient time. Top Places to visit in Koraput, Odisha
content:
Koraput is a district of Odisha, India, and known for rich and diverse types of mineral deposits. It is located along the Eastern Ghats.
Koraput is a town and a Municipality in Koraput district in the Indian state of Odisha. Koraput town is the district headquarter of Koraput district.</p

title: Top Places to visit in Kendrapara, Odisha
content: Kendrapara District is an administrative district of Odisha state in eastern India. The town of Kendrapara is the district headquarters. title: Top Places to visit in Malkangiri, Odisha
content: Malkangiri historically known as 'Malikamardhangiri' is a town and a Municipality in Malkangiri district in the Indian state of Odisha. It is the headquarters of the Malkangiri district. Top Places to visit in Nabarangpur, Odisha
content: Nabarangpur District, also known as Nabarangapur District and Nawarangpur District, is a district of Odisha, India. The city of Nabarangpur is the district headquarters. title: Top Places to visit in Nuapada, Odisha
content: Nuapada is a city in western region of Odisha state of eastern India. It is the headquarters of Nuapada district. title: Top Places to visit in Nayagarh, Odisha
content: Nayagarh district is one of the 30 districts of Odisha State in eastern India. It was created in 1992 when the erstwhile Puri District was split into three distinct districts, namely Khurdha, Nayagarh and Puri. It is home to the Baisipali Wildlife Sanctuary.
